text: aur unakee qaum ke log unase hujjat karane lage to ibaraaheem ne kaha tha kya tum mujhase khuda ke baare mein hujjat karate ho haaloki vah yaqeenee meree hidaayat kar chuka aur tum me jin buton ko usaka shareek maanate ho mai unase darata (varata) nahin (vah mera kuchh nahin kar sakate) magar ho mera khuda khud (karana) chaahe to alabatta kar sakata hai mera paravaradigaar to baetabaar ilm ke sab par haavee hai to kya us par bhee tum naseehat nahin maanate
